Name: NNF Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the base messages for Near Node Flash (NNF)

FabricReady.Description: Indicates that the fabric and all child resources are ready
FabricReady.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate the fabric resource has completed its startup sequence and is ready for operation
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the fabric resource identifier.

ResourceOperationFailed.Description: Indicates that operation on a resource failed
ResourceOperationFailed.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that an internal errored occurred on the resource
ResourceOperationFailed.Message: The requested create of resource type '%1' failed with error '%2'
ArgLongDescription: This argument shall contain the schema name of the resource.
This argument shall contain the error message for the failure.
